about_the_game:
It is the 726th century - Humanity has expanded among the many galaxies, numbering in the quintillions, joining the teeming cornucopia of intergalactic sentient life. Wanting to experience different ways of living, a massive new wave of colonization begins as people seek to experience a less technic life.

You take on the role of an Ecxo, travelling far ahead of the colonization waves, and leagues outside of Human inhabited space. It is your task to setup the initial phases of system colonization. You will build matter extractors, solar collectors, surveyors, and the like to assess suitability of planets and solar systems. Collect data along the way to research new ways to optimize your buildings, your ship, and your enterprise. How far will you go?

  • Incremental Gameplay, start out with basic technologies and improve them as you gather new data from planets
  • Explore new landing sites, setting up an economy, gathering resources, and collecting data to return to your ship
  • Upgrade your buildings to explore, expand, and exploit on their own, and watch as your landing zone grows from barren landing to sprawling complex
  • Upgrade your ship over time, and take to new systems, exploring planets faster and faster.
  • Clone a new Ringer of yourself, warp to a new galaxy, and do it all again! (Gaining powerful advantages along the way)

name: Eclectic Expansion Enterprise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Expand among the stars! It is 72k years in the future, and a new wave of Human expansion abounds. Join the ranks of the Ecxos, prep star systems for habitation, and develop your tools and ships to enterprise ever faster and further.
